formattedAddress: 437 W 47th St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 437 W 47th St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text:
I had the opportunity to do some volunteer work at the College Reentry program at Fountain House. This program is so well thought out. College reentry fills a unique niche for students who have the will to continue his or her  education after having endured some serious emotional adversity. The organization and staff are so earnest and devoted in supporting its members, it is warming and remarkable to observe .  All of the program is housed in a cozy, welcoming townhouse in Midtown, which is very inviting and peaceful.
The percentage of participants who have gone on to complete their studies is very  high. I believe College Reentry has created a wonderful model to aid students resume their education. The program teaches many holistic methods in addition to traditional modes of support to help cope with stressors. College Reentry is the byproduct of very thoughtful, informed and creative professionals.

originalText.text: Great program run by great people. I started this program at a difficult point in life and I received nothing but the most encouraging support. The location is at a great spot in the middle of Hell’s Kitchen, and the space itself is sunny and comfortable. The staff will really listen and work with you on your college/future plans, and everything is about your health and overall life satisfaction. They take feedback seriously and actually made adjustments to their curriculum after my group made suggestions. There’s really nothing else like CRE and I’m so happy it existed for me and is still helping other people. Julie Anna and Jason are the best!

originalText.text: College Re-Entry is that program I wish I knew about while I was still in college. They help tons of college-level students dealing with mental health challenges navigate through your myriad priorities while in and out of school. I'm sure it would benefit a lot of students like me who does a great deal of tackling many priorities while preventing burnout. They also guide you on how to best take a leave of absence in school, what to do best while you're in leave, and how you can re-enter university and start building relationships with people again.

originalText.text: Fountain House College Re- Entry is an amazing program with wonderful people located in a beautiful space in midtown Manhattan. I have spent time with many of the highly motivated students and staff who together create a great learning and growing environment. I am greatly inspired by everyone associated with CRE.

originalText.text: This incredible program offers an amazing staff who provide outstanding support and mentoring, classes and life skills all the while boosting confidence and success. Students transform from being isolated, shy and unsure to confident, curious and bursting with the energy to grow and prosper. New friends are made and cherished. This program helps students regain the life they almost lost.
